Package: io.vertx.groovy.ext.mail

[Groovy] Class MailClient

    • io.vertx.groovy.ext.mail.MailClient

    • SMTP mail client for Vert.x

      A simple asynchronous API for sending mails from Vert.x applications

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          MailClient (Object delegate)

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          void close()
          close the MailClient
          static MailClient createNonShared(Vertx vertx, Map<String, Object> config)
          create a non shared instance of the mail client
          static MailClient createShared(Vertx vertx, Map<String, Object> config, String poolName)
          Create a Mail client which shares its data source with any other Mongo clients created with the same pool name
          static MailClient createShared(Vertx vertx, Map<String, Object> config)
          Like MailClient.createShared but with the default pool name
          Object getDelegate()
          MailClient sendMail(Map<String, Object> email = [:], Handler<AsyncResult<Map<String, Object>>> resultHandler)

      • Constructor Detail

        • MailClient(Object delegate)

      • Method Detail

        • void close()

          close the MailClient

        • static MailClient createNonShared(Vertx vertx, Map<String, Object> config)

          create a non shared instance of the mail client

          Returns:
          MailClient instance that can then be used to send multiple mails
          Parameters:
          vertx - the Vertx instance the operation will be run in
          config - MailConfig configuration to be used for sending mails (see MailConfig)

        • static MailClient createShared(Vertx vertx, Map<String, Object> config, String poolName)

          Create a Mail client which shares its data source with any other Mongo clients created with the same pool name

          Returns:
          the client
          Parameters:
          vertx - the Vert.x instance
          config - the configuration (see MailConfig)
          poolName - the pool name

        • static MailClient createShared(Vertx vertx, Map<String, Object> config)

          Like MailClient.createShared but with the default pool name

          Returns:
          the client
          Parameters:
          vertx - the Vert.x instance
          config - the configuration (see MailConfig)

        • Object getDelegate()

        • MailClient sendMail(Map<String, Object> email = [:], Handler<AsyncResult<Map<String, Object>>> resultHandler)

          send a single mail via MailClient

          Returns:
          this MailClient instance so the method can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          email - MailMessage object containing the mail text, from/to, attachments etc (see MailMessage)
          resultHandler - will be called when the operation is finished or it fails (may be null to ignore the result)
